summary: The diff implements all 7 requirements: backend adds OS (Windows/Ubuntu) and planExpiry fields to ClientRecord with migration support; frontend adds OS dropdown and date picker to ClientRegistrationForm and ClientEditModal; ClientDashboard conditionally displays SshInstructionsCard for Ubuntu or RdpInstructionsCard for Windows; ClientProfileMenu displays plan name and formatted expiration date. All CRUD operations handle the new fields correctly.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module with data migration logic in backend/migration.mo
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention data migration, schema migration, or upgrade paths for existing records. The migration.mo file handles conversion from OldClientRecord to NewClientRecord with default values.
